note: He/him/they/them. Blogging, writing (fiction & nonfiction), reading/sci-fi & fantasy lit, music, retro computing & gaming, travel, economics. Lots of 68k Mac, Sun, and HP machines, classic Mac OS & A/UX, Apple II, VAX & OpenVMS, SunOS & Solaris, HP-UX, Amiga, AtariST, SGI, Plan9, PPC Macs, Unix/BSD/Linux, SNES, Virtual Boy, Sega Genesis & Saturn. Star Wars & Forgotten Realms nerd. Destroy all hierarchies. My life for my cats.
